pages.text: Welcome to the entry on the Dungeon. Before we go into our first dungeon, we need to learn the basics. Dungeons are randomly generated, which means no two are the same. You can find loot in the chests and your goal is to kill the dungeon boss. In order to do that, you need to find the boss room and unlock it with the $(h)Boss Key$(), which will let you into the boss arena. Once you kill the boss, you can leave.

The enemies you fight are based on your $(h)Dungeon Level$(), the higher level you are, the harder the dungeon (and the better the loot). You can level up by completing dungeons but also by eating $(h)Phat Dinner$(). You can see your dungeon level above your hunger bar. Another thing to note is that you cannot set your spawn in the dungeon, or go back after you have died. Make sure not to run out of time.$(br)$(h)Good luck, adventurer.$()
